cards.title: It's perfectly normal, okay?
cards.text: Drink if you've ever thought a cartoon character was hot

cards.title: Interrogation
cards.text: Drink if you've ever willingly commited a crime

cards.title: Calcium Deficient
cards.text: Drink if you've ever broken a bone

cards.title: Who's calling at 3am?
cards.text: First person to call %PLAYER1% on their phone won't have to drink

cards.title: Meow
cards.text: All cat owners drink

cards.title: Bark
cards.text: All dog owners drink

cards.title: Hoot
cards.text: Everyone that has owned a bird has to drink

cards.title: It numbs the fear
cards.text: Everyone who has an irrational phobia takes a drink

cards.title: Bottoms up!
cards.text: Last person to stand up takes a drink

cards.title: Can you not?
cards.text: Drink if your drink is in a can

cards.title: Don't bottle it up
cards.text: Drink if your drink is in a bottle

cards.title: Struck out the books
cards.text: Everyone can only refer to people by description for %TURNS%

cards.title: Feeling glassy eyed?
cards.text: Drink if your drink is in a glass

cards.title: Keep your ears open
cards.text: %SELF% picks a word, next time anyone says it, they must down their drink

cards.title: Hit the stretches!
cards.text: If you can't touch your toes while standing, take a drink

cards.title: Et tu?
cards.text: %SELF% says a quote from media, %PLAYER1% must guess where it's from or drink

cards.title: Liberal
cards.text: Anyone with dyed hair must drink

cards.title: Funny enough, my name isn't Jeff
cards.text: %SELF% must say (or private message) the full name of %PLAYER1%  If you can't, drink

cards.title: Surely there's tea to be spilled
cards.text: Everyone must read their last message out loud or drink

cards.title: ‚úÇÔ∏è
cards.text: The girl with the shortest hair must drink

cards.title: üí™
cards.text: If you play any sports, drink

cards.title: 0's and 1's
cards.text: Drink if you know how to code

cards.title: Higher Education
cards.text: Take a drink if you're in college or university

cards.title: Keepin' Hydrated
cards.text: Drink if you've had water since the start of the game

cards.title: Clean Palate
cards.text: Anyone with a chaser must drink

cards.title: Heavy Drinker
cards.text: The person who's drinking the drink with the highest % chooses someone to drink

cards.title: OBEY.
cards.text: %SELF% can ban a word for %TURNS%

cards.title: Scavenger Hunt!
cards.text: First person to get a toilet roll DOESN'T drink

cards.title: Scavenger Hunt!
cards.text: First person to get a fork DOESN'T drink

cards.title: Scavenger Hunt!
cards.text: First person to get a battery DOESN'T drink

cards.title: Scavenger Hunt!
cards.text: First person to get a pillow DOESN'T drink

cards.title: Sound Guru
cards.text: Drink if you have more than one pair of headphones

cards.title: Where's That Sound Coming From?
cards.text: Drink for every speaker you have (internal and external)

cards.title: We appreciate ambition
cards.text: The person that has had the most jobs must drink.

cards.title: Sin and Vice
cards.text: Smokers drink

cards.title: Drop and give me 10
cards.text: Do 10 pushups or take a drink
Last person to touch the wall takes a drink

cards.title: Woke up in a right steaming mood
cards.text: Everybody must be VERY ANGRY for %TURNS%
%SELF% can only use chat for %TURNS%

cards.title: The Untrapped Clim
cards.text: The person with the best hair must drink

cards.title: From start to end
cards.text: %SELF% and the person they've known longest must drink

cards.title: Brexit means Brexit
cards.text: Drink if English isn't your native language

cards.title: üëÅüëÑüëÅ
cards.text: %SELF% has to take a drink everytime they blink for %TURNS%

cards.title: Cheers bud, eh?
cards.text: You choose someone to drink with you

cards.title: It's not wine but...
cards.text: If you've been to a church within the last year, drink

cards.title: üïã
cards.text: Alhamdulillah, drink some water

cards.title: Gotta know what you gotta know
cards.text: %SELF% must ask %PLAYER1% a question about themselves, if the don't get it right they must drink

cards.title: A Tad Peckish
cards.text: Drink if you have snacks with you

cards.title: A sign of things to come
cards.text: The person with the least money must drink

cards.title: Spare some change?
cards.text: The person with the most cash on them must drink

cards.title: üá∫üá¶ SLAVA UKRAINI üá∫üá¶
cards.text: Drink if your drink has vodka in it

cards.title: Alcohol fueled passion
cards.text: %SELF% must give a passionate speech about how great %PLAYER1% is, then both take a drink
If you're a virgin, L lol, take a drink

cards.title: Hopeless romantic
cards.text: Drink if you're single

cards.title: Alcoholics unanonymous
cards.text: As a group, choose the most sober person, they must down their drink

cards.title: Where has it gone?
cards.text: Drink if your drink has rum in it

cards.title: Blasting to retirement
cards.text: Oldest person drinks

cards.title: üß¢
cards.text: %SELF% cannot tell the truth for %TURNS%

cards.title: And so it is...
cards.text: Everybody must end their sentence with "and so it is" for %TURNS%

cards.title: Table for one
cards.text: drink if you ate dinner alone.

cards.title: Starting early
cards.text: Youngest person drinks

cards.title: Catfish
cards.text: If you've been catfished, drink
%SELF% drinks if they answer any question for %TURNS%

cards.title: Midnight Explorer
cards.text: Drink if you've ever been lost on a night out.

cards.title: Doppleganger
cards.text: The two players who look the most alike must drink

cards.title: British cuisine
cards.text: %SELF% and %PLAYER1% say a meal, the person with the worse meal drinks

cards.title: We don't do slow celebrations
cards.text: Raise your drink! Last person to do so takes a drink

cards.title: Posture check
cards.text: If you're sitting with a bad posture, drink

cards.title: Fill'er up
cards.text: Fill your drink!

cards.title: Who? When? Where?
cards.text: Everyone ignores the existance of %PLAYER1% for %TURNS%

cards.title: Round 2
cards.text: Drink if you were drinking yesterday

cards.title: Bush burners
cards.text: Stoners drink

cards.title: It's time for bold claims
cards.text: Drink for each person you think you could beat in a fight

cards.title: Play nice for once
cards.text: Everyone gives %SELF% a compliment then takes a drink

cards.title: Cracker Island
cards.text: People from the UK and Ireland must drink

cards.title: Happy birthday?
cards.text: %SELF% must drink if they can't say the birthday of %PLAYER1%

cards.title: üá∫üá∏
cards.text: If you've ever shot a gun, take a drink

cards.title: Mistakes are to be made
cards.text: Everyone chooses the drunkest person, they must drink

cards.title: Overdressed
cards.text: Vote for who is most fancily dressed, they must drink

cards.title: Pick Your Poison
cards.text: %SELF% must take a dare from %PLAYER1% or down their drink

cards.title: Short King
cards.text: Shortest person must choose someone to drink

cards.title: Tall Queen
cards.text: Tallest person must pick someone to drink

cards.title: ü§ì
cards.text: Everyone wearing glasses must drink

cards.title: Touch grass
cards.text: Drink if you've used twitter in the past 24 hours

cards.title: Jebus
cards.text: The guy with the longest hair must drink

cards.title: Violence has it's consequences
cards.text: Drink if you've ever been in a fight

cards.title: Delinquent
cards.text: Drink if you've ever skipped school

cards.title: Inked Up
cards.text: Take a drink if you have a tattoo

cards.title: Commander In Cheat
cards.text: Drink if you've cheated on a test

cards.title: Remember to brush your teeth
cards.text: Take a drink if you've ever chipped a tooth

cards.title: Self-made Hair Stylist
cards.text: Drink if you've ever cut your own hair

cards.title: Feeling Sleepy?
cards.text: Drink if you've gone under general anaesthetic before

cards.title: Who Wears The Pants?
cards.text: Drink if you've ever gone commando in public

cards.title: Generous Soul
cards.text: Drink if you've donated blood

cards.title: Bruiser
cards.text: Drink if you've had a black eye before

cards.title: Kind Words
cards.text: %SELF% and %PLAYER1% must pay each other a compliment and drink

cards.title: Hit 'Em Where It Hurts
cards.text: %SELF% and %PLAYER1% must insult each other and drink

cards.title: Quickfire Opinions
cards.text: %SELF% and %PLAYER1% must agree on anything at all within 10 seconds, or drink

cards.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors, Drink!
cards.text: %SELF% and %PLAYER1% must play Rock, Paper, Scissors. Whoever wins gets to choose someone to drink!

cards.title: Raise a glass!
cards.text: Drink if you want!

cards.title: Cheers!
cards.text: Everyone drinks!

cards.title: üß≤
cards.text: Everyone with a piercing must drink

cards.title: Order!
cards.text: Take a drink if you've ever been to court

cards.title: boo
cards.text: Drink if you believe in the paranormal

cards.title: üëΩ
cards.text: Drink if you believe in extraterrestrial life

cards.title: Late present
cards.text: The person who last had their birthday can choose someone to drink

cards.title: Not everyone is cut out for survival
cards.text: As a group, decide wo is most likely to last the longest in a zombie apocalypse, they drink

cards.title: Luv beer, simple as
cards.text: If you have been to a pub within the last week

cards.title: Responsible citizen
cards.text: If you've voted in an election, take a drink

cards.title: How's the outside world
cards.text: The last person to have been abroad must drink

cards.title: Premartial h*nd-holding
cards.text: If you've held hands with someone in the last week, drink

cards.title: You may kiss the b-...ottle
cards.text: Last person to have been to a wedding must drink

cards.title: It's okay, it's a matter of taste
cards.text: The person with the worst music taste must drink

cards.title: It's a dog eat dog world
cards.text: As a group, decide who would be eaten first on a stranded island, they drink

cards.title: Making memories went awry
cards.text: Drink if you've ever blacked out from drinking

cards.title: It's a free world after all
cards.text: Drink if you've ever done a drug besides marijuana
Drink if you've done edibles.

cards.title: Drunk Pirate ft. Pitbull
cards.text: Drink for every country you've been to

cards.title: Hold it!
cards.text: Next person to take a wee must down their drink

cards.title: Making due
cards.text: Drink if you took a wee somewhere besides a toilet within the last month

cards.title: üôè Only the most Christian drinking games üôè
cards.text: Nobody can swear for %TURNS%

cards.title: No guillotines, but we've drinks
cards.text: Anyone with more than 5k in their bank account must drink.

cards.title: Tower of Babel
cards.text: %SELF% cannot speak English for %TURNS%

cards.title: uugh...?
cards.text: Everyone can only speak using grunts for %TURNS%

cards.title: Prove it
cards.text: The person with the highest alcohol tolerance takes a drink

cards.title: Giving the rainbow back
cards.text: If you're wearing a colour besides black and/or white take a drink

cards.title: Bark for me
cards.text: You can only bark and woof for %TURNS%

cards.title: uh oh, stinky
cards.text: If you've not showered today, take a drink

cards.title: The Bulgarian special
cards.text: Drink if you're not wearing socks

cards.title: Better times
cards.text: If you have a childhood toy nearby, take a drink

cards.title: Grace
cards.text: %SELF% says something they're grateful for, then takes a drink

cards.title: Unenergized
cards.text: The person with the lowest battery on their phone must take a drink

cards.title: Play by ear
cards.text: %SELF% and %PLAYER1% say a song, the person with the worse song drinks

cards.title: Colourblind need not apply
cards.text: %SELF% and %PLAYER1% say a colour, the person with the worse colour drinks

cards.title: üëÄ
cards.text: %SELF% chooses the person they'd want to get high with the most, then both drink

cards.title: We need to you get you a caretaker
cards.text: The person who's most likely to get into the most trouble on a night out must drink

cards.title: We've all got something right
cards.text: %SELF% admits something embarassing, then drinks

cards.title: Feeling nervous?
cards.text: Drink if you've bit your nails in the last week

cards.title: üá¨üáß FOR QUEEN AND COUNTRY üá¨üáß
cards.text: If you've drank tea in the last 24 hours, take a drink

cards.title: Room inspection!
cards.text: The person with the messiest room must drink

cards.title: Hope you don't need to drive home
cards.text: If you have a drivers license, take a drink
